TopicTitle: I still cannot get the ladders to deploy, using Mac

Articles.Content: Sorry to post this again, but I don\'t know what to do. I\'ve re-downloaded the game at least 4 times, and every time it\'s the same: I right click the ladder to try and get it to deploy, but nothing happens. I\'ve tried with the trackpad and a mouse. Any help is appreciated.
What happens when you right click on it?
Nothing at all. The fuel tank is green when I put my mouse over the ladder, like I want to click on the fuel tank, but the ladder won\'t turn that light green. And then nothing at all.

You didn\'t need to start another thread on this.

Now, just for the record, you\'re not trying to open the ladder in the VAB, it\'s after going to the launchpad, correct?

Cheers!

KSP Community Manager
Sorry about that; it\'s just upsetting as I paid $ for the game. Yes, I\'m trying to open it on the launch pad, not in the VAB.

You paid for a game in ALPHA development. That means that anything and everything could be bugged at any time. That\'s the nature of the beast.

Cheers!

Yeah the game is really buggy at times.

Are you EVA\'ing while trying to extend the ladder? If you are focused on the rocket then you have access to all the controls, however if you are under EVA it seems you only have access to the right click menu for parts within a certain distance.
